name: abslti
body: |- wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, cr)
-| wcel(c1, cr)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))))

-| wcel(c1, cr)

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))))

comment: Absolute value and 'less than' relation. (Contributed by NM, 6-Apr-2005.)
